items.title: Core CPI In Focus With JPMorgan, Goldman, Netflix Set To Report Earnings
items.description: This week witnesses earnings from banking giants like JPM, WFC, BAC, BLK. Investors may also look at Core CPI and Core PPI on Tuesday and Wednesday.

items.author: Reuben Gregg Brewer
items.description: Motley Fool CEO Tom Gardner suggests the S&P 500 is expensive at 26x earnings, but investors can find opportunities in value stocks, foreign stocks, and dividend stocks through strategic ETF investments.

items.title: Q2 Earnings Season Preview: Markets Lean on Tech Strength as Macro Cracks Appear
items.author: Lance Roberts
items.description: Q2 2025 earnings season begins with cautious expectations, as earnings estimates have been cut due to trade risks and economic slowdown. Technology and AI-focused companies are expected to provide strength, while consumer spending and energy sectors show weakness.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Strong AI investment, expected to report robust earnings and revenue growth
